【15.6″ FHD Display】15.6″ FHD (1920*1080), IPS-Level 60Hz 45%NTSC Thin Bezel, Non-Touch Screen, enjoy your photos, movies, and games with the crisp quality.
【10th Gen Intel 4-Core i5-10300H】Equipped With The Most Powerful and Fast 10th Gen Intel 4-Core i5-10300H (Base Clock 2.5GHz, Max Boost Clock Up to 4.5GHz, 8MB Smart Cache, 8 Threads)

【Upgraded to 16GB system memory for intense multitasking and gaming】Reams of high-bandwidth DDR4 RAM to smoothly run your graphics-heavy PC games and video-editing applications, as well as numerous programs and browser tabs all at once.
【Upgraded to 512GB solid-state drive (PCI-e)】Save files fast and store more data. With massive amounts of storage and advanced communication power, PCI-e NVMe SSDs are great for major gaming applications, multiple servers, daily backups, and more.

Warranty & Support

Amazon.com Return Policy:You may return any new computer purchased from Amazon.com that is “dead on arrival,” arrives in damaged condition, or is still in unopened boxes, for a full refund within 30 days of purchase. Amazon.com reserves the right to test “dead on arrival” returns and impose a customer fee equal to 15 percent of the product sales price if the customer misrepresents the condition of the product. Any returned computer that is damaged through customer misuse, is missing parts, or is in unsellable condition due to customer tampering will result in the customer being charged a higher restocking fee based on the condition of the product. Amazon.com will not accept returns of any desktop or notebook computer more than 30 days after you receive the shipment. New, used, and refurbished products purchased from Marketplace vendors are subject to the returns policy of the individual vendor.

Product Warranty: For warranty information about this product, please click here

Price: $138.99 - $129.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 05:00:15 UTC – Details)

Product Description

Small size–saving space

Small dimension (106 x 106 x 18 mm) and light weight (232g) make the mini pc more convenient to carry outside. You can also hang it behind the monitor, which greatly saves your space.

4K Dual display

Beelink T4 Pro can give you wonderful visual enjoyment thanks to the built-in HD Graphic 500. You can smoothly enjoy the 4K videos. Meanwhile, you can connect 2 displays at the same time with 2 HDMI ports, which greatly saves your time.

CPU: Apollo Lake Processor N3350

Beelink T4 Pro Mini PC is equipped with N3350 Processor (2M Cache, 1.10GHz up to 2.40GHz) and pre-installed with Win 10. The powerful hardware gives you a stable Internet environment.

Storage

Built-in 4GB LPDDR3 RAM and 64GB eMMC ROM, the mini computer has enough storage space for you to deal with daily work, watch videos, browse the Internet, home entertainment, etc. Fully meets your daily needs.

Dual WiFi and Bluetooth

T4 Pro Mini PC provides 2.4G + 5.8G dual WiFi, Gigabit Ethernet and Bluetooth 4.0. You can enjoy stable wireless connection and high transfer speed.

Heat sink and fan

The powerful heat dissipation function (built-in heat sink and quiet fan) enables the mini desktop computer to cool down in time, improving the operating efficiency.

Interface: 1 x DC in port, 4 x USB 3.0 ports, 1 x LAN port, 2 x HDMI ports, 1x Audio Jack (HP&MIC)Packages: 1 x T4 Pro Mini PC, 1 x HDMI Cable (100cm), 1 x Power Adapter 12V/1.5-2A, 1 x User Manual

[N3350 Processor] Beelink T4 Pro mini pc has installed with Win 10 Apollo Lake Processor N3350 which has 2M Cache, 1.1GHz up to 2.4GHz. It provides a stable environment for work and entertainment.
[4GB RAM and 64GB eMMC ROM] Loaded with 4GB RAM and 64GB eMMC ROM, the mini computer could offer you enough memory storage to meet your daily needs such as entertainment, video, web browsing, and work.
[Dual HDMI] With 2 HDMI ports, the mini pc can easily connects 2 monitors at the same time. Meanwhile, it comes with HD Graphics 500 so you can enjoy the web surfing, home theater, game and so on with your family members.
[Dual WiFi and Bluetooth] The mini pc provides 2.4G + 5.8G dual WiFi and Gigabit Ethernet. It means that you can transfer and download data at a high speed. Besides, you are available to connect with many devices which support Bluetooth connection because of the built-in Bluetooth 4.0.
[Ultra-thin Stylish Design] Thanks to the ultra thin design (106 x 106 x 18 mm and light weight of 232g), this mini pc can be hang behind the monitor and even carried on the journey, which can greatly save your space. Besides, it has the fan and heat sink to cool down the pc and make the cpu and hard drive work normal.

Product Description

Smaller Mini PC!

Why Choose Beelink MiniS Mini PC?

1.Newest Design: Smaller!!! As big as palm-size. Compact in size, you can take it anywhere you go.

2.Professional: MiniS mini computer is designed for the business office. Compatible with professional working software.

3.Cost-effective: Built-in Gen 11th N5095 (4C/4T, 4M Cache, 2.0GHz up to 2.9GHz), Which supports DDR4 single-channel, enjoying the extremely fast speed. Equipped with UHD Graphics, dual HDMI and type-c allow you to connect three monitors and multi-tasking.

Note:

If you received a mini pc with windows 11 system, if you need windows 10 pro system, please send us a message and we will guide you to install windows 10 pro.

Top Choice for the Business Office and Education Industry!

Beelink MiniS Mini PC Basic Specifications

CPU: Intel Jasper Lake(Celeron) Processor N5095(4C/4T, 4M Cache, 2GHz up to 2.9GHz) enables better multi-tasking

GPU : Intel UHD Graphics & Dual HDMI2.0 Ports. Support dual display and 4K ultra high definition streaming capability, giving you a best in class television experience with true to life picture quality.

OS: Windows 11 Pro

Language: Multi-language

RAM: 8GB

Hard Disk: 256GB

Network: WiFi 802.11 b/g/n/ac, 2.4+5.8G WiFi, Ethernet 1000Mbps LAN, Bluetooth 4.0

Adapter: Input: 100-240V AC, 50/60Hz , Output: 12V 3A

Fully capable of browsing the internet, word processing (runs Microsoft Office and LibreOffice smoothly), watching movies and photo processing!

Tips to Better Use Mini Pc

You can add a 2TB removable hard drive via the USB 3.0 port, which will allow the device to store even more and your files as you want

Regularly delete the software distribution folder in windows directory to keep updates size use down. This folder is used for updates for windows

Uninstall any program or app that isn’t needed or used. Once done, there was enough space to update Windows

Beelink MiniS Mini computer Support RTC Wake Settings, Auto Power On, Wake On Lan, PXE Boot etc. You can set it on the BIOS(Press the DEL key immediately after pressing the power button to enter the BOIS page)

Note:

To avoid initial setup issues, the first time you use this mini pc , don’t connect network or wifi until the windows system of your mini pc is running!

Rich Interface and Compact Size

Rich interface allows you th connect your home and office set wirelessly and wirely, like your projector, printer and your home TV. As big as palm size and light in weight, which allows easily carry it with you and also attach to the back of the monitor.

Compatible Stylem

Licensed Windows 11 Pro 64bit pre-installed on mini pcs with no visible bloatware.

You can also install Linux OS!

Package

1* Beelink MINI S Mini PC

2*HDMI 100CM&25CM 1.4

1* Power adapter (12V/3A)

1*Wall-Mounted bracket

1* Manual

Major CPU Running Scores, More Powerful than Others!

Common FAQ:

Q1: What should I do if I find a product with a lower pri~ce within a month?

Please do not re~turn, contact our store staff to re~fund the difference, BeelinkUS let you enjoy the lowest pri~ce.(7-day pri~ce protection & excluding official pro~motion days)

Q2: What should I do if I don’t like the windows 11 pro system?

Please do not return, please contact the service staff of our store to get windows 10 pro system files and tutorials.

Q3: How to enter BIOS?

Press “delete” to enter the BIOS settings; press “F7” to enter the boot options menu (click continuously immediately after booting).

Q4: What should I do if a product defect is found?

Please do not return it, you can contact our staff to solve the problem for you, or make compensation. We offer 1-year factory professional support & 7*24 hours online service.

windows 10/windows 11/ubuntu windows 10/windows 11/ubuntu windows 10/windows 11/ubuntu windows 10/ubuntu windows 10/ubuntu

Processor

Graphics Coprocessor

Ethernet /Wireless Connectivity
1000Mbps LAN, 802.11ax Dual-Band Wi-Fi 6E, BT5.2 Dual 1000Mbps LAN, 802.11ac Dual-Band Wi-Fi, BT4.0 Dual 1000Mbps LAN, 802.11ac Dual-Band Wi-Fi, BT4.0 1000Mbps LAN, 802.11ac Dual-Band Wi-Fi, BT4.0 1000Mbps LAN, 802.11ac Dual-Band Wi-Fi, BT4.0

2 x HDMI (4K@60Hz) 2 x HDMI (4K@60Hz) 2 x HDMI (4K@60Hz) 2 x HDMI (4K@60Hz) 2 x HDMI (4K@60Hz)

Auto Power On

✓

✓

✓

✓

✓

◆Smaller but Equally Powerful – Compared with U59 mini pc, MiniS is more compact, only about 4.5x 4 x1.6 inches. As big as palm-size, easier to carry anywhere you go. Powered by 11th Gen processor N5095 (4C/4T, 4M Cache, up to 2.9GHz), delivers incredible responsiveness and is more smooth than J4125, J3455, J4205, N3450, etc. Easily switch back and forth between more applications with 8 + 256GB memory configuration. Compact size makes the mini computers the top choice for your light OFFICE work.
◆UHD Graphics & Dual HDMI2.0 – Mini desktop computer has equipped with UHD Graphics, supporting 4k video playback and web surfing, or connect to your projector as a home theatre, enjoy a variety of entertainment. Dual HDMI2.0 allows you to connect two monitors at the same time, simplifying and doubling your work efficiency.
◆Wireless Supports – The latest wireless connectivity with 802.11ac Dual Band 2.4 & 5GHz Wi-Fi, offers speeds up to 450Mbps on the 2.4GHz band & 1300Mbps on the 5GHz. In addition, there is a built-in Bluetooth4.0 system. High-speed wireless connection technology, reliable and efficient transmission speed, providing a faster internet experience for browsing, streaming and gaming.
◆Intelligent Design – What makes the small pc stand out from other micro pc is that it has an empty expansion bay to allow adding. Beelink MiniS mini desktop pc has built-in 8GB DDR4 RAM, 256GB M.2 SATA SSD (Support up to 2TB of 2.5in 7mm SATA3 HDD /M.2 SATA3 SSD 2280, not included). Also, the VESA mount can free you from the messy desktop. It is convenient to hide the mini pcs on the back of the monitor or HDTV.
◆Efficient Heat Dissipation & Multi-interfaces – The mini computer built-in fantastic cooling fan, heat sink, and hard drive cooler help cool down the hardware and reduce hardware loss, delivering faster response speed. MINI S desktop pc features a variety of interfaces design (4*USB3.0, 2*HDMI2.0, 1*RJ45 1000M LAN, 1*Audio Jack, 1*DC Jack). It also comes with 1 power adapter, 2*HDMI cables, and 1*VESA mount. Small computers easily meet office business needs, home audio and video needs.

Beelink Mini PC

Small But Powerful

◆Smaller but Equally Powerful – Compared with U59 mini pc, MiniS is more compact, only about 4.5x 4 x1.6 inches. As big as palm-size, easier to carry anywhere you go. Powered by 11th Gen processor N5095 (4C/4T, 4M Cache, up to 2.9GHz), delivers incredible responsiveness and is more smooth than J4125, J3455, J4205, N3450, etc. Easily switch back and forth between more applications with 8 + 256GB memory configuration. Compact size makes the mini computers the top choice for your light OFFICE work.
◆UHD Graphics & Dual HDMI2.0 – Mini desktop computer has equipped with UHD Graphics, supporting 4k video playback and web surfing, or connect to your projector as a home theatre, enjoy a variety of entertainment. Dual HDMI2.0 allows you to connect two monitors at the same time, simplifying and doubling your work efficiency.
◆Wireless Supports – The latest wireless connectivity with 802.11ac Dual Band 2.4 & 5GHz Wi-Fi, offers speeds up to 450Mbps on the 2.4GHz band & 1300Mbps on the 5GHz. In addition, there is a built-in Bluetooth4.0 system. High-speed wireless connection technology, reliable and efficient transmission speed, providing a faster internet experience for browsing, streaming and gaming.
◆Intelligent Design – What makes the small pc stand out from other micro pc is that it has an empty expansion bay to allow adding. Beelink MiniS mini desktop pc has built-in 8GB DDR4 RAM, 256GB M.2 SATA SSD (Support up to 2TB of 2.5in 7mm SATA3 HDD /M.2 SATA3 SSD 2280, not included). Also, the VESA mount can free you from the messy desktop. It is convenient to hide the mini pcs on the back of the monitor or HDTV.
◆Efficient Heat Dissipation & Multi-interfaces – The mini computer built-in fantastic cooling fan, heat sink, and hard drive cooler help cool down the hardware and reduce hardware loss, delivering faster response speed. MINI S desktop pc features a variety of interfaces design (4*USB3.0, 2*HDMI2.0, 1*RJ45 1000M LAN, 1*Audio Jack, 1*DC Jack). It also comes with 1 power adapter, 2*HDMI cables, and 1*VESA mount. Small computers easily meet office business needs, home audio and video needs.

Warranty & Support

Amazon.com Return Policy:You may return any new computer purchased from Amazon.com that is “dead on arrival,” arrives in damaged condition, or is still in unopened boxes, for a full refund within 30 days of purchase. Amazon.com reserves the right to test “dead on arrival” returns and impose a customer fee equal to 15 percent of the product sales price if the customer misrepresents the condition of the product. Any returned computer that is damaged through customer misuse, is missing parts, or is in unsellable condition due to customer tampering will result in the customer being charged a higher restocking fee based on the condition of the product. Amazon.com will not accept returns of any desktop or notebook computer more than 30 days after you receive the shipment. New, used, and refurbished products purchased from Marketplace vendors are subject to the returns policy of the individual vendor.

Price: $189.00 - $168.00
(as of Nov 30,2022 04:30:52 UTC – Details)

Product Description

Built for Students

Designed for K-12 students, the ASUS BR1100 is the good learning companion with its durable qualities like the scratch-resistant cover and all-rounded rubber bumper .The tamper-resistant keyboard ensures that it will stay in one piece for next lesson. With the increased need to work on devices, having a low emission blue light screen helps students stay focused without eye-strain. If the battery charge drops 20% or the notebook loses connectivity, the LED indicator lights up alerting teachers that students need help.

Serviceability

Servicing laptops for education can be a lengthy process with costly fixes and slow turnaround time for school operations. The ASUS BR1100 is built in a modular design with retained screws to mitigate lost time and equipment pieces. Its military-grade durability will help battle against daily rigors that can occur inside and outside of class.

Flexible network support

Make the IT team’s job simpler with Windows Autopilot, a service provided by Microsoft to help set up devices remotely without needing to physically handle the laptops. All devices can be configured remotely so students can stay engaged without class time interruptions.

Distance learning

Designed with the latest performance features including a noise reduction camera with a security shield and an AI noise cancelling microphone, the BR1100 helps reduce distractions. With a wide array of connectivity, including optional LTE, can easily integrate into any learning space.

Processor: Intel Celeron N4500 1.1GHz Dual-Core Processor (4MB Cache, Up to 2.8GHz)

Graphics: Intel UHD Graphics

Operating system: Windows 10 Pro 64-bit

Memory: 4GB DDR4 SDRAM

Hard Drive: Up to 2TB PCIe NVMe M.2 Solid State Drive + 128GB eMMC

Optical Drive: No

Display: 11.6″ HD LED Backlit Display, Eye Care certified by TÜV Rheinland

Connectivity: 802.11a/b/g/n/ac/ax Wi-Fi 6 and Bluetooth 5.0 wireless connectivity

Audio: 2 x 1.5W Speakers, AI Noise-canceling Audio Technology

Keyboard: US English, Non-Backlit Full Size Keyboard

Built-in HD Webcam: 720P Camera with Privacy Shutter and Dual Array Microphones

Media Drive: Multi-format SD media card reader

Ports:

1 x USB 3.2 Gen 2 Type-C with a power delivery support2 x USB 3.2 Gen 1 Type-A1 x AC smart pin1 x HDMI1 x Headphone / Mic Combo Jack1 x RJ-45 Ethernet Port

Battery: Up to 14 Hours

Color: Almond

Dimensions L x W x H (inches): 11.6 x 8.1 x 0.8

Weight: 2.8 lbs

【Storage & RAM】Enjoy up to 15x faster performance than a traditional hard drive with 128 GB storage and experience improved multitasking with higher bandwidth thanks to 4 GB of RAM
【Built for Students】Designed for K-12 students, the BR1100 is the perfect learning companion with its durable qualities like the scratch-resistant cover and all-rounded rubber bumper .The tamper-resistant keyboard ensures that it will stay in one piece for next lesson. With the increased need to work on devices, having a low emission blue light screen helps students stay focused without eye-strain.
【US Military-grade Standard】Build to withstand everyday knowks, bumps, drops and spills without damage. So, whether it’s dropped from a classroom desk or the dining table, it’s build to keep on going.
【Child Centered Design】Its child centered design features webcam privacy shield, germproof keyboard and TÜV certified display to protect eyes.
【Operating System】Windows 10 Pro 64-bit

Product Description

WHY CHOOSE OUVISLITE GK3V MINI PC?

1) Trustworthy Quality

We use Intel Celeron J4125 quad-core chip, DDR4 and M.2 SSD for more stable and smoother experience, OUVISLITE GK3V Mini PC will show you the performance of small form factor PC in all aspects.

2) Mature Mold Design

GK3V Mini PC has a high-quality appearance and compact component layout. With the unique air inlet and outlet design, it can dissipate heat more effectively. The snap-on cover design lets you view or upgrade internal components in one step.

3) 4K HD Visual Feast

Equipped with Intel Graphics 600 GPU, let’s reject monotonous color experience from now on, making home theater worthy of its name.

4) Triple Display Support

Dual HDMI plus VGA realizes the same and different display on three screens, you can expand the working space to multiple monitors, allowing you to gain a more efficient and comfortable productivity experience.

5) Energy Saving and Using Friendly

The TDP for the CPU is a very economical 10 Watts, more energy saving and low consumption. Noise tested at 35 decibels, avoiding the noise pollution of the mainframe.

Interface Details

2 x HDMI Ports1 x VGA Port2 x USB 3.0 Ports2 x USB 2.0 Ports1 x 1000Mbs LAN Port1 x 3.5mm Audio jack

OUVISLITE GK3V Mini PC Specification

Mini Desktop Computer

CPU: Intel Celeron Processor J4125

Processor Base Frequency: 2.00 GHz

Processor Burst Frequency: 2.70 GHz

Cores: 4

Threads: 4

Cache: 4MB

GPU: Intel UHD Graphics 600(Up to 750Mhz)

Memory Types: 12GB DDR4

Storage Types: 256GB M.2 SSD

Faster with Intel J4125 CPU

Equiped with powerful and high cost-effective CPU, the mini pc has decent performace and better than J3455 or J4205. Run Photoshop and other office software smoothly and handle multitasking easily.

Triple Screen Display

With dual HDMI ports and a VGA port, the mini computer easily realizes three-screen simultaneous display or different display. Which will greatly doubles your productivity and Enhance your office experience.

Small but Powerful

Designed with 5.11 x 5.11 x 1.96 inch small form factor size, which is only the size of a palm. And the weight of 1.87lb, so you can take it anywhere easily. Say good bye to bukly mainframes.

Frequently Asked Questions:

Q1: Already installed Windows 11 Pro?

Yes, the GK3V comes pre-installed with Windows 11 Pro and You are free to use other operating systems such as Linux, Ubuntu. If you are accustomed to using the Windows 10 version, please contact OUVISLITE to obtain the Windows 10 Pro system installation file.

Q2: Don’t have a product key in the box or email of the mini pc you purchased?

We have activated our Windows product key for you. Right click on the blank space to enter properties, then you can view your product key. It is not safe to send product key in the package or email. The key is already used to activate your Windows, so it cannot be used on other computers.

Q3: Is the machine noisy when running?

To cool the machine, the GK3V Mini PC only produces about 35 decibels of fan sound when fully loaded. Most of the time it’s within the normal range. If you are bothered by machine noise, please inform OUVISLITE.

Q4: How can I enable multiscreen?

After connecting the HDMI cable or VGA cable to the screen, right-click on the desktop to enter the display settings, and then detect and identify more monitors.

Note:

To avoid waiting for system loading, please don’t connect to the network when you first use the Mini PC until you Fully entet into windows system desktop.

OUVISLITE MINI PC support other ways to extend storage:

2.5 inch SATA SSD/HDD up to 2TB(Not include).Replace a M.2 SATA HDD.Add removable hard drives to expand the storage.

Storage expansion to meet your needs for storing more applications, work files, Audio files and videos.

【Meet to Sufficient Memory Storage】This mini pc achieves 12GB memory capacity with dual-channel DDR4 and comes with 256GB of storage. While ensuring cost-effective, the larger capacity brings you a better multitasking experience. Newbie friendly storage upgrade support:1)2.5 inch SATA SSD/HDD up to 2TB(not include). 2)replace the M.2 SATA SSD. Expand your applications, files, video or audio freely.
【J4125 Mini PC Windows 11 Pro】Celeron Gemini Lake J4125 Quad-Core processor with base frequency of 2.0 GHz and up to 2.7 GHz in burst. Let the minis to run multiple applications, web pages, full HD video or office software smoothly. Windows 11 preinstalled and automatically activated after connecting to the Internet, plug and play!
【Enjoy Immersive Visual Experience】The desktop computer has 2 HDMI ports and 1 VGA port for triple screen output, supporting three-screen simultaneous display or different display. The combination with HD Graphics 600 (up to 750MHz) makes work more efficient, 4K@60Hz HD brings you a visual feast. Whether you use it as a home pc or a business pc, it can meet your more personalized needs.
【Wireless Technology and Smart Fan】This mini computer built in 2.4G/5G dual band WiFi and Bluetooth 4.2, which could be easily and stably connected to wireless keyboard, mouse, speaker, etc. Low noise heat sink fan design means more efficient heat dissipation, providing a cooler and quieter working environment for the computer.
【Stylish Design and Ample Interfaces】The front face of the machine has an indicator light, and the snap-on cover design makes it easy to expand storage. Anti-slip rubber feet to avoid scratching the desktop. With 5.11 x 5.11 x 1.96 inch small body, it also equiped with 2 x USB 3.0 ports, 2 x USB 2.0 ports, 1 x 1000Mbs LAN port,1 x 3.5mm Audio jack，2 x HDMI, 1 x VGA to meet diverse needs.
【OUVISLITE is Always There for You】GK3V desktop pc supports Auto Power on / Wake on LAN / PXE / RTC Wake / 7X24 Hours Operation. These design features will bring you convenience and consideration at any time in life. We also provide a satisfaction and lifetime consulting services for you, please feel free to contact us if you have any problem in use.
